# Gibberish Product Generator 

Simple fake product names generator 

1. How to use it:
    ```python
    from jibberjabber import jibber
    
    # includes product category
    jibber(category=True)
    ('Yellow Squash Aback', ' VEGETABLE')
    
    # product only
    jibber()    
    'Yello Squash Aback'
    ```
